definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: The important part is the management of financial counting.
sentences.chinese: 重點是財務對帳的管理。

sentences.english: Perform account reconciliations. Respond to and resolve vendor inquiries.
sentences.chinese: 及時迴應客戶的疑問並按時對帳。

sentences.english: To perform inter-company Debit Notes issuing and monthly inter-company reconciliations.
sentences.chinese: 向關聯公司出具收款通知，並每月進行對帳。

sentences.english: Be in charge of financial document, prepare bills and send out reminders as request.
sentences.chinese: 負責財務文件，整理和編制對帳信息和催單。
